comment.author: 66311327@N05
comment._content: Sidney G. Johnson, salesman for the Union Switch and Signal Co. was accused of attempting to bribe a commissioner. This case was treated in the Thompson Committee, see p.e. Omaha daily bee., December 21, 1915, Page 5 (with photo) The evening world., December 15, 1915, Final Edition, Image 1 New-York tribune., December 18, 1915, Page 2 Senator George F. Thompson:
